QuestData.Title: The Future of the Rockpool
QuestData.Description: The Rockpool tadpoles left upon this crate appear tired, scared, and nearly dried out. They need to be taken to the water, and quickly.$b$bPerhaps if you can drag this crate across the beach and into the Forbidden Sea, far off the coast of the Red Reaches, then they will have a chance of escaping, and the Rockpool murlocs may live on...
QuestData.LogDescription: Drag the Abandoned Bloodwash Crate to the Forbidden Sea off the coast of the Red Reaches.
QuestData.RewardText: The Rockpool tadpoles float off into the distance, thankful and safe.

Objectives.Objective: Rockpool Tadpoles returned to the Forbidding Sea
